mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message ( message_num, room_num, sender_num, content, sent_at ) VALUES ( chat_message_seq.nextval, #{room_num}, #{sender_num}, #{content}, SYSDATE )

SELECT m.message_num, m.room_num, m.sender_num, m.content, m.sent_at, TO_CHAR(m.sent_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as sent_date, u.user_name as sender_name,
(CASE WHEN m.sender_num = #{current_user_num} THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_member cm WHERE cm.room_num = m.room_num AND cm.user_num != m.sender_num AND cm.is_active = 'Y' AND cm.user_num NOT IN ( SELECT mr.user_num FROM chat_message_read mr WHERE mr.message_num = m.message_num )) ELSE 0 END) as unread_count
0 as unread_count
FROM chat_message m LEFT JOIN euser_detail u ON m.sender_num = u.user_num WHERE m.room_num = #{room_num} ORDER BY m.sent_at ASC

SELECT m.message_num, m.room_num, m.sender_num, m.content, m.sent_at, TO_CHAR(m.sent_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as sent_date, u.user_name as sender_name, (CASE WHEN m.sender_num = #{current_user_num} THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_member cm WHERE cm.room_num = m.room_num AND cm.user_num != m.sender_num AND cm.is_active = 'Y' AND cm.user_num NOT IN ( SELECT mr.user_num FROM chat_message_read mr WHERE mr.message_num = m.message_num )) ELSE 0 END) as unread_count FROM chat_message m LEFT JOIN euser_detail u ON m.sender_num = u.user_num WHERE m.room_num = #{room_num} AND m.message_num > #{lastMessageId} ORDER BY m.sent_at ASC
